description:
Shopee menawarkan pengalaman belanja online yang lebih hemat lebih cepat bagi jutaan pengguna setiap harinya. Pengguna dapat melakukan jual beli dengan aman kapan pun dan di mana pun!

Nikmati berbagai penawaran & fitur terbaik:
- Tempat belanja online produk lokal no.1. Temukan beragam produk lokal terbaik di Shopee!
- Bebas ongkir ke seluruh Indonesia
- Interaksi & lihat langsung produk favoritmu di Shopee Live
- Garansi Tepat Waktu untuk jaminan waktu pengiriman. Gratis voucher kalau telat!
- Nikmati harga terbaik setiap hari di Flash Sale & Termurah di Shopee
- Diskon spesial & bebas ongkir khusus pengguna baru
- Ada 100% produk original dari semua online shop di Shopee Mall.

------------

Shopee merupakan platform e-commerce terpercaya di Indonesia. Shopee mendukung bisnis melakukan transformasi digital dan meningkatkan cakupan, serta membantu lebih banyak pengguna mengakses dan memanfaatkan layanan digital, serta memberdayakan komunitas dan UMKM lokal. Shopee terus berkomitmen untuk membantu mitra pengusaha UMKM, pengusaha lokal, dan brand sukses dalam ekonomi digital.

------------

Shopee bekerja sama dengan pihak penyelenggara PT Lentera Dana Nusantara untuk menawarkan layanan pinjam tunai bernama SPinjam melalui aplikasi Shopee. SPinjam oleh PT Lentera Dana Nusantara berizin dan diawasi oleh OJK (Otoritas Jasa Keuangan). SPinjam menyediakan dana tunai s/d 50JT serta periode pembayaran pinjaman 3-12 bulan.

Simulasi Pinjaman:
Jumlah pinjaman: Rp3.000.000, 
Periode pinjaman: 6 bulan,
Bunga: 1.95%/bulan (Maksimal Persentase Bunga Tahunan 27%),
Biaya administrasi: 1%/transaksi,
Maka Total pembayaran = Rp3.381.000 atau Rp563.500/bulan.

Sesuai kebijakan privasi Shopee, kami berkomitmen melindungi semua data dan informasi pengguna.

Alamat: Jl. Jenderal Sudirman Kav. 3, Karet Tengsin, Tanah Abang, Jakarta Pusat 10220

------------

Kunjungi WEBSITE kami: www.shopee.co.id
Like FACEBOOK kami: facebook.com/ShopeeID
Follow TWITTER kami: twitter.com/ShopeeID
Follow INSTAGRAM kami: @shopee_ID

Alfagift provides a different grocery delivery shopping experience in online supermarkets with various benefits for Alfamart members. Connected with more than 17,000 Alfamart stores throughout Indonesia, helping you to buy & shop for daily needs with discount prices, lots of promotions, fast delivery & free shipping.

Alfagift Grocery Delivery: Instant Delivery & Unlimited Free Shipping
- Shop online for Alfamart products via Alfagift, and get your grocery needs with free shipping, without conditions or limits!
- Products labelled "Stok Dari Toko " will be sent with instant delivery or same day delivery from nearest Alfamart SAPA (Siap Antar Pesanan Anda) for orders purchased before 21.00 pm.

Instant Delivery & Unlimited Free Shipping
- Shop online at Alfamart using Alfagift and get your grocery needs with free shipping, without conditions or restrictions!
- Products labeled "Stock from Store" will be sent instantly from the nearest Alfamart shop for orders placed before 21.00.

Alfagift Special Products & Promos
- Buy groceries such as cooking oil, sugar, rice, eggs, cooking spices, gallons of mineral water, snack, and other Alfamart products at the best prices, with various discounts and free shipping.
- Shop for exclusive Alfagift grocery products that are not available in Alfamart stores, such as premium milk, baby diapers, delicious snack, imported goods, shopping vouchers, gift cards, fruit, meat, and other fresh products, sent directly from the Alfamart warehouse.
- Buy phone credits, data packages, and electricity tokens, and pay BPJS and PDAM water dues/bills.

Official Store
- Follow various official accounts of your favourite famous brands to shop for your favourite products with many promos and discounts.
- Receive notifications to get the latest information about shopping promotions at Alfamart.

Alfamart Promo Catalog
- Check the latest Alfamart shopping promo catalogue online more easily with Alfagift! Make your monthly shopping more budget-friendly with affordable prices and free shipping!
Store Locator
- A feature that recommends the closest Alfamart shop according to your location so you can buy shop at low prices and enjoy free shipping anywhere in Indonesia.

Complete & Easy Payment Methods
- Enjoy the convenience of shopping for groceries with various payment methods, such as digital wallets/e-wallets (GoPay, ShopeePay, OVO, & Dana), bank transfers (virtual accounts), credit cards & cash (COD).

Alfamart/Alfagift Member Benefits
- A-Poin: Member benefits as cashback points that can be used as discounts or exchanged for various vouchers.
- A-Voucher: Member benefits as Alfamart shopping vouchers. Make your purchases more affordable by using several vouchers in one transaction.
- Alfa Stamp: Member benefits as digital stamps from online purchases at Alfagift and offline purchases at Alfamart stores within a certain program period. These stamps can be exchanged for attractive prizes or offers at Alfamart stores and the Alfagift app.
- Alfa Star: Member benefits as rewards from purchasing a certain amount of products, which can be exchanged for prizes or giveaway coupons.
Integrated Membership
- Integrated membership system between online and offline activities. Get many benefits by mentioning the member/cell phone number registered on your Alfagift account, or by scanning the member's barcode in the Alfagift app when making a payment at the cashier.
- Check e-receipts, A-Poin, Alfa Stamp, Alfa Star, and other member benefits directly in the app, making your online grocery shopping experience easier and more economical.
- Increase your online grocery shopping frequency at Alfagift and level up your membership grade from Newbie to Royal to Crazy Rich! The higher the grade, the more benefits.

Download, install, and register for Alfagift, Alfamart's membership and online shopping app, and enjoy the various conveniences of shopping for groceries online!

Akulaku is a marketplace which possess various services in it to support life necessities in order to achieve a better life

- Buy Now Pay Later
- Installment without Credit Card
-  Cash out from Credit Limit
-  Akulaku Pay goods credit in other e-Commerce 
-  Can credit handphone, phone credit, data plan, movie ticket, plane ticket, electricity and water

Everything you want is in Akulaku! Download Akulaku now!

Lots of Product Choices
Starts from gadget, laptop, camera, fashion, household necessities, mother and baby to other daily necessities can be paid in installments in Akulaku. A lot of daily promos awaits you! Look for everything you need, whenever, and wherever with just Akulaku Mobile App!

Safe, Easy and Trusted Shopping
Do not worry about shopping in Akulaku App. Akulaku will give the best service to customer. Payment cn be made in lots of choices.

Installment Without Credit Card
For Gadget, Camera and other products, you can pay in installments with tenor 3, 6, 9, 12 months with low down payment. Only up to 15% without the need for credit card!

You can also apply for loans to financial partner through Akulaku
- Loan Tenor : Installment payment, tenor more than 91 days. Start 3, 6, 9, to 12 months
- Loan Limit : Up to 15 Million
- Admin Fee : Every month, 1% from Loan Principal
- Interest : Every month, 0.6% from Loan Principal
- Maximum annual interest rate (APR) is 30%, include monthly interest fee and monthly admin fee.

Example : If you apply for a loan of Rp2.000.000 with tenor of 6 months, monthly interest fee charged is  0.6% from loan principal, and monthly admin fee charged is 1% from loan principal. Then monthly bill you have to pay is Rp365.333, the total of all payments is Rp2.192.000, with APR 17.72%.

Best Service Guarantee
- Call Center Akulaku : 1500920, active 24 hours everyday from Monday - Sunday.
- Fast delivery, 48 hours delivery for Jabodetabek (Greater Jakarta).
- Easy return, return can be made within 7 days of receiving the goods.
- Automatic Refund, refund funds transferred to your bank account within 24 hours automatically!

Akulaku financing services is supported by PT Akulaku Finance Indonesia which domiciled in Sahid Sudirman Center 11C, Jl. Jend. Sudirman No. 86, RT.10/RW.11, Karet Tengsin, Tanah Abang, South Jakarta, Jakarta Capital Special Region 10250, Indonesia, registered in OJK with permit number KEP-436/NB.11/2018

Shop with Ease, Enjoy Great Deals, and Get Exactly What You Ordered – Only on Tokopedia!

Curious about how fun shopping on Tokopedia can be? Or what promos can help you save more? Let us spill the details for you:

Free Shipping Every Day
Worried about expensive shipping fees? No need! At Tokopedia, you can shop freely without stressing over shipping costs. With plenty of Free Shipping quotas throughout the month, happiness is guaranteed!

Enjoy Daily Promos and Discounts
Got your eyes on something special? Don’t worry—Tokopedia has it all:

 - Flash Sales
 - Guaranteed Discounts for selected items
 - Discount Promos

And the best part? You can stack the promos for extra savings! Shopping just got a whole lot better.

Trusted Sellers
Unsure about a store’s credibility? Relax. Check store reputations and trusted review. Shop safely without any hassle.

Top-Up and Pay Bills Easily with #FastAndEasy
Need phone credit or want to pay your bills? Just open Tokopedia! From ATM transfers, mobile banking, and Virtual Accounts to Alfamart, Indomaret, and more—everything is quick and simple. Don’t forget to grab extra promos for even more benefits!

So, what are you waiting for? Download the Tokopedia app now and discover exciting promos that make online shopping even more fun. Don’t miss out!

Got questions, feedback, or suggestions? We're all ears! Reach out to Tokopedia's customer care directly via: https://www.tokopedia.com/help 

Elevate your online shopping journey with Tokopedia App by allowing access to the following: App Permission

Klik Indomaret, One Stop Online Shop

Selama lebih dari 30 tahun melayani kebutuhan konsumen lewat 20 ribu gerai toko dan 46 distribution center, Indomaret hadir lebih dekat untukmu melalui Klik Indomaret, sebagai one stop online shop.

Tinggal klik di Klik Indomaret, kamu bisa mendapatkan ribuan pilihan produk yang lengkap dengan harga terbaik di Klik Indomaret. 

Klik Indomaret, easy & safe online shopping.


Varian Produk Beragam

Mau belanja beragam varian produk? Tentu bisa! Seluruh kebutuhan sehari-hari mulai dari makanan, minuman, fashion, produk kesehatan dan kecantikan, home and living, produk Puspita Nusantara, produk segar, keperluan ibu dan anak, hingga gadget dan elektronik tersedia di sini. Tak ketinggalan, tiket travel, tiket wahana, dan berbagai produk virtual bisa kamu dapatkan juga di Klik Indomaret.


Kemudahan & Keamanan Bertransaksi

Nikmati kemudahan dan keamanan bertransaksi online melalui Klik Indomaret untuk tingkatkan pengalaman berbelanja kamu! Pilihan metode pembayaran yang bervariasi, seperti transfer antar bank (BRI Virtual Account, Mandiri Virtual Account, BCA Virtual Account, dan virtual account lainnya), cash on delivery/COD, internet banking (BCA KlikPay), uang elektronik (i.saku, Rekening Ponsel CIMB Niaga, LinkAja, ShopeePay, OVO), kartu kredit (Visa, Master Card, JCB, Amex), kartu kredit/debit online (Mandiri, BNI, BRI, BCA, CIMB Niaga), cicilan kartu kredit (BCA, Mandiri), cicilan tanpa kartu kredit (Akulaku), serta payment point di toko Indomaret seluruh Indonesia menjadi solusi transaksi yang terpercaya.

Klik Indomaret bekerja sama dengan Bank BCA, CIMB Niaga, BNI, BRI, Mandiri, PermataBank dan bank lainnya untuk mengoptimalkan proses transaksimu. Ditambah lagi, fasilitas cicilan 0% untuk tenor 3-12 bulan dari mitra bank serta promo gratis ongkir khusus produk toko Indomaret hadir spesial untuk kamu!


Luasnya Jangkauan Area Pengiriman

Tenang aja, di mana pun kamu berada, Klik Indomaret akan terus hadir untukmu. 

Jangkauan area pengiriman Klik Indomaret telah mencapai banyak titik kota di Indonesia, di antaranya Jabodetabek, Bandung, Semarang, Yogyakarta, Surabaya, Malang, Jember dan Denpasar, hingga Medan, Palembang, Pekanbaru, Bandar Lampung, Banjarmasin, Samarinda, Pontianak, Makassar, Manado, Kupang, juga Sorong.


Added Values for Customers
One stop online shop
Gratis biaya pengiriman*
Secure e-payment
Pembayaran di semua gerai toko Indomaret


#tinggalKLiK

Lebih dari sekadar tagline, #tinggalKLiK menjadi dasar bagi Klik Indomaret untuk terus memberikan kemudahan dan keamanan berbelanja serta bertransaksi.

Belanja di Klik Indomaret makin aman, mudah, dan hemat!

Recently, we've been notified of several cases where our app is promoted fraudulently by some third-party advertisers, usually in the form of site redirection, fake vouchers, and games. description:

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

OLX, a simple and secure platform to buy and sell goods and services!

As the largest marketplace for goods and services in Indonesia, discover hundreds of thousands of listings, from cars, motorbikes, gadgets, electronics, to household needs.

You can use the Booking Aman feature (from Rp500,000) to buy a car, motorbike, or phone safely with a money-back guarantee if the item doesn’t match the claim. You can also choose to pay with COD: just find the item, meet the seller, and make the deal!

Want to sell something? OLX gives you access to over 8 million active buyers. You can also boost your sales with affordable ad packages, with discounts up to 40% during the Flash Sale.

For those looking to buy or sell trusted used cars, #PilihYangAhli only at OLXmobbi, ahlinya mobil bekas berkualitas, available within the OLX app.

For Buyers:
Engine & transmission warranty for up to 1 year
7-day money-back guarantee
FREE maintenance service (T&Cs apply)
2.000+* certified cars available
Simple process: choose a car, schedule a test drive, and select a payment method

For Sellers:
Inspected directly by our experts
Hassle-free selling: check your price, check your car's condition, and verify your account
Get paid within ±60 minutes after deal and document verification

Come and experience a simpler, safer, and more reliable way to buy and sell on OLX.
Download or update the OLX app today!

description:
ZALORA - Asia’s Online Fashion Expert
When it comes to fashion shopping online, ZALORA is your go-to style guru! We’ve got an exciting lineup of local & international brands, all handpicked for fashion lovers - just like you.

We offer a wide selection of categories & brands, including beauty, health, electronics, kids, toys, & more. The best part? Products are 100% authentic! But wait—there’s more! Flash sales & exciting campaigns happen regularly. Stay ahead by keeping an eye on our Shopping App for big events such as Monthly sales, Payday Sale, Birthday Sales, and 10.10, 11.11 and 12.12 Mega Sales. Enjoy huge savings with cashback, vouchers, discounts, & promo codes. Our advice? Add all your must-haves to your wishlist for quick check out when sales season hits! Not sure what to grab? ruparupa merupakan official partner dari AZKO, INFORMA, INFORMA Electronics, Krisbow, Toys Kingdom, dan business unit Kawan Lama Group lainnya. Temukan berbagai produk lengkap dan berkualitas untuk kebutuhan rumah, hobi, dan gaya hidupmu dalam satu aplikasi.

ruparupa rewards

Gabung sekarang dan dapatkan Koin untuk transaksi online dan di toko Official Partner yang berpartisipasi.


ruparupa share & earn

Dapatkan komisi hingga jutaan hanya dengan bagikan link produk di media sosial kamu.


Tantangan Seru

Kini kamu bisa ikutan berbagai tantangan seru dan dapatkan voucher belanja spesial jika berhasil selesaikan tantangan.


Scan & Shop

Belanja di toko tapi antrean panjang? Pakai Scan & Shop aja! Scan barcode produk, check out di aplikasi, langsung bawa pulang barangnya.


Ambil di Toko

Butuh barang cepat? Kamu bisa pilih metode "Ambil di Toko" untuk ambil pesananmu di toko terdekat.


Download aplikasi ruparupa sekarang dan rasakan pengalaman belanja kebutuhan terlengkap dan tepercaya hanya dalam satu genggaman!


Butuh bantuan? Tim ruparupa care dengan senang hati membantu kamu di help@ruparupa.com

Belanja gadget resmi dengan promo menarik, semua bisa kamu temuin di erafone. Semua gadget dan aksesoris dijamin original dan bergaransi resmi dari brand-brand ternama seperti Apple, Samsung, Xiaomi, Oppo, Vivo, Honor dan brand lainnya.

Dengan sistem yang terhubung ke ratusan toko di seluruh Indonesia, erafone bikin belanja makin fleksibel. Bisa pesan online, ambil di toko; atau datang ke toko dan transaksi secara online. Semua transaksi didukung dengan pilihan pembayaran yang lengkap dan gak pake ribet.

erafone hadir sebagai solusi belanja gadget yang aman, nyaman, dan bebas worry.

Ada berbagai keuntungan belanja di erafone:
1. Belanja terintegrasi dan ternyaman di Indonesia: Akses offline store di seluruh Indonesia, Belanja jadi lebih dekat. 
2. Belanja aman & bebas khawatir: Semua produk dijamin original dan bergaransi resmi.
3. Promo jalan terus & ada loyalty rewards: Dapatkan diskon, voucher dan poin MyEraspace setiap bertransaksi.

Nikmati kemudahan berbelanja di erafone dengan berbagai fitur yang bisa kamu rasakan seperti:
Click & PickUp: Pesan barangnya secara online dan ambil di toko yang kamu pilih dengan mudah, tanpa perlu antre atau nunggu lama.
Gratis ongkir ke seluruh Indonesia: Gak perlu khawatir ongkir mahal ke luar pulau, belanja di erafone, belanja murah nggak pakai ongkir.

Download sekarang untuk temukan berbagai promo dan keuntungan berbelanja di erafone!

New upgrade: Taobao English is now available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, Canada, Cambodia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Macau, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Kyrgyzstan, Georgia and Mongolia!For other regions, stay tuned! We're working hard to upgrade for you, in the meantime, you can still shop in our Chinese interface!

Taobao (iPhone version) offers a convenient and engaging shopping experience, specifically designed for iPhone users.

As a leading e-commerce platform in China, Taobao provides an extensive selection of products, catering to the diverse and personalized needs of over 1 billion users. Known as the "Omnipotent Taobao", it stands as a trusted destination for quality and variety for its users. 

Every day, consumers from around the globe visit Taobao, eager to explore more products for their daily needs and keep up with the latest trends!Product Features:

1. Extensive Range of Global Brands
Discover thousands of brands and retailers, offering both Chinese and international products to consumers worldwide.

2. Diverse Offerings from Small and Medium-sized Vendors
Access tens of millions of unique products from small and medium-sized businesses, as well as innovative entrepreneurs, showcasing creative and thoughtfully designed items.

3. Safe and Seamless Shopping Experience
We've integrated local e-wallets and credit card payments in selected regions, along with cross-border direct shipping options. Some products also feature free shipping and/or local return services, ensuring a secure, joyful, and effortless shopping journey.

4. NEW English Interface Now Available!
The English interface is available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, and Cambodia. Simply update your language settings. We're working hard to expand this feature to more regions soon!

5. Year-Round Promotional Activities
Take advantage of our numerous promotional events throughout the year. Enjoy discounted prices and exclusive platform benefits, making it easy to find high-quality products at even better prices.

IKEA Indonesia app allows you to shop for furniture and home accessories from home more easily and conveniently. Not only shopping and finding lots of home inspirations, with IKEA Indonesia app you can also join IKEA Family membership and get many exciting rewards.

SHOPPING ONLINE OR OFFLINE IS EASY

IKEA Indonesia app comes with clear and easy navigation features to create a comfortable online shopping experience. Browse our collection by the type of product or room you want to redecorate. You can also search your desired product directly by typing the product’s name on our search box. Complete and transparent product information helps you find the product that really fits your space.

If you want to shop at store, IKEA Indonesia app provides information about the stock in each IKEA store. In addition, there is also a barcode scan feature that allows you to scan product article numbers at store to view product details and add them in your shopping list.

INTEGRATED WITH IKEA FAMILY

Through IKEA Indonesia app, you can register as an IKEA Family member for free and get many special rewards. You can use IKEA Family rewards when shopping online or offline. There are also special events and activities for IKEA Family members only.

ENJOY A MORE ORGANISED IKEA COLLECTION & INSPIRATION

IKEA Indonesia app is not only a convenient place for online shopping, but also a home inspiration center. Explore hundreds of home decorating ideas and tips & tricks more easily using the categories feature.

GET THE LATEST INFORMATION 

There’s always something new going on at your IKEA Indonesia store. The app will always keep you up to date with events, offers and new products.

Carousell is the leading multi-category classifieds and recommerce marketplace in Singapore, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Malaysia, Philippines and Indonesia that lets you sell and buy everything including fashion, luxury, mobile phones, books, toys, cars, motorcycles, home services (renovation, cleaning, movers) and more.

We dream of a world where people instinctively sell their under-utilised items instead of letting them go to waste, and where others buy them as a first choice. Hence, Carousell was started to make buying and selling preowned items easier. 

To sell, simply take a photo to start listing on the marketplace and even start your online store. Too busy to list? You can also sell clothing, mobile phones, luxury bags and cars directly to Carousell*.

To buy, simply search for what you want. Shop secondhand mobile phones, luxury bags and cars with a peace of mind by looking for Carousell Certified listings with the ‘Certified’ tag^. Also look out for listings with the ‘Buyer Protection’ tag and ‘Buy’ button# which allows you to make purchases directly on the app via secure payment methods with escrow protection and access delivery options with popular logistics partners.

FOR SELLERS
- Snap, list, sell: Create free listings with up to 10 photos to sell your preloved or new items
- Start an online store easily with our suite of Seller Tools or run your business on Carousell with a CarouBiz subscription
- Sharing your listings easily on popular platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Telegram and Wechat for more visibility
- Become a trusted seller by earning positive reviews from buyers
- Sell clothing, mobile phones, luxury bags and cars directly to Carousell (Singapore only, and Malaysia for mobile phones and luxury bags)
- Access integrated delivery options with Carousell Official Delivery where you can drop off your orders or have them picked up from your doorstep (Singapore only) or 7-ELEVEN Cash on Delivery also available in Taiwan

FOR BUYERS
- Explore a treasure trove of unique, vintage and limited edition items
- Customise your search with keywords for fast and easy discovery
- Improve your home with available home services like aircon servicing, renovation, repairs, cleaning, movers and delivery
- Shop secondhand mobile phones, luxury bags and cars with a peace of mind with Carousell Certified (Singapore only, and Malaysia for mobile phones)
- Make purchases directly on the app with the ‘Buy’ button via secure on-platform payment methods, and enjoy Buyer Protection if your item doesn't arrive or is significantly not as described (Singapore, Malaysia and Hong Kong only)

*Available in Singapore, and Malaysia for mobile phones and luxury bags
^Available in Singapore, and Malaysia for mobile phones
#Available in Singapore, Malaysia and Hong Kong

Terms of Use: https://carousell.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360023894734

Halo Family Midi!

Midi Kriing adalah aplikasi digital yang dihadirkan oleh Alfamidi guna memudahkan Family Midi berbelanja kebutuhan keluarga sambil tetap beraktifitas seperti biasa melalui ponsel.

Midi Kriing bisa apa aja sih?

1.	Family Midi Pesan, kami antar tanpa biaya* di hari itu juga. S&K
2.	MidiKriing juga menyediakan layanan pre-order untuk produk buah dan sayur untuk menjaga mutu dan kesegarannya (saat ini baru berlaku area coverage Alfamidi Jabodetabek)
3.	Kemudahan dan keamanan dari fasilitas pembayaran transaksi belanja online melalui Midi Kriing
4.	Dimungkinkan untuk pembayaran di tempat (COD), kecuali transaksi buah dan sayur, pulsa, paket data dan pembayaran tagihan harus dilakukan pembayaran secara online
5.	Adanya pilihan waktu antar pesanan (pagi-siang-sore) 
6.	Penawaran dan Program khusus bagi pengguna Midi kriing
7.	Pelayanan dari Alfamidi terdekat dengan radius maksimal 5km
8.	Layanan pesan antar ini sudah berlaku di semua area coverage Alfamidi seluruh Indonesia (kecuali untuk buah dan sayur sementara ini baru berlaku di area coverage Jabodetabek)

Ayo unduh #MidiKriingAja karena kebutuhan Family Midi selalu ada di Midi Kriing dan rasakan belanja gak pake ribet.

Shop smarter and save more with ShopBack. Discover the best deals, pay easily and get rewarded with Cashback on your shopping. Withdraw your Cashback earnings effortlessly via PayPal or bank account (available in select markets only). Join over 45 million shoppers across 13 markets, including the United States, Germany,  Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Malaysia, Korea, Hong Kong, the Philippines, Indonesia, Taiwan, Thailand and Vietnam. 

Shop online and earn Cashback
Start your shopping with ShopBack, and stack your savings with online sales, coupon codes, loyalty programs , credit card miles and more at over 3,500 stores globally (number of stores will differ by country). 

**Pro-tip: Install the ShopBack Button on your Chrome web browser and shop online as usual. The ShopBack browser extension will find the best Cashback deals and discounts with just a click.**

Shop and pay with ShopBack (available in select markets only)
Boost your rewards and earn extra Cashback when you pay with ShopBack Pay at over 4,700 outlets, both offline and online (number of outlets will differ by country).

Purchase gift vouchers and earn Cashback (available in select markets only)
Earn instant Cashback when you purchase gift cards or vouchers in the ShopBack app for yourself or loved ones, and use them at your favorite online or offline stores.

Not convinced yet? Here are some of our favourite merchants:

TRAVEL: Choose from Booking.com Agoda, Expedia, Klook and more to get Cashback on your flight, hotel bookings, and anything travel-related.

FOOD: Hungry? Get delivery from foodpanda and Deliveroo, groceries from RedMart and FairPrice, or make reservations to dine out with friends and family with Eatigo and Quandoo. (Psst! You can use ShopBack Pay to pay at these places too!)

RIDES: Get the best deals on your cab rides with Grab, Ryde, and more.

FASHION & BEAUTY: Love shopping on Lululemon, Nike, ASOS, Taobao, REVOLVE and more? Get your makeup, hair, fashion and beauty fix on ShopBack!

ELECTRONICS: Want the latest iPhone? A Microsoft Surface? We’ve got you the best electronics deals at Amazon, Lazada, Shopee, Rakuten, Apple, Gearbest, Microsoft and lots more for the mobile phones, tablets, laptops, cameras and gadgets you can't live without.

---
What exactly is Cashback? Where does the money come from?

If you love shopping online, you’re probably always looking for a good deal. Cashback, coupon codes and browser extensions all help you save money, and you've come to the right place!

So, what is Cashback? When you click through ShopBack to our partners, we give you a portion of your spending back. Stores pay us commissions for sending our members to their platforms, and we share that with you in the form of Cashback. It's a win-win, and a great way to earn money while shopping online! 

The best part about getting Cashback is, of course, cashing out. Get yourself some extra money to shop more! 

How do you get Cashback?
Sign up for your free ShopBack account and browse on our app, website or browser extension to find what you love.
Click through ShopBack to be redirected to the store’s site. Shop, apply the coupon code that you’ve found on our site, and pay as you normally would. 
Cashback will be tracked in your ShopBack account and ready to be withdrawn once the store and ShopBack have verified your purchase.
Get paid via PayPal or bank account!

Selamat datang di aplikasi Indogrosirku!

Aplikasi ini adalah bentuk keanggotaan member Indogrosir dalam bentuk digital. Kartu member tidak dicetak secara fisik, dan ditampilkan di aplikasi.

Bagi Anda yang ingin belanja di Indogrosir, wajib memiliki kartu anggota. Berikut Kami sampaikan jenis member di Indogrosir
Member Biru
Berlaku untuk umum (End User). Syarat untuk menjadi member ini sangat mudah, yaitu hanya dengan mengisi formulir pendaftran di aplikasi My Indogrosir atau yang bisa mengisinya di bagian member service di setiap toko Indogrosir. Benefit yang didapatkan berupa promosi reguler berupa potongan harga/hadiah langsung atau mypoin yang dapat digunakan sebagai pemotong pembayaran.

Member Merah
Dikhususkan untuk member Indogrosir yang bergerak dibidang usaha retail (Toko kelontong, P&D, Minimarket) Koperasi, Restoran/Rumah Makan, Hotel,Rumah Sakit/Apotek, Koperasi.  Syarat untuk menjadi member ini  : 

1.	Memiliki toko dengan jarak radius +/- 10 Km dari gerai Indogrosir
2.	Menjual ke End User langsung
3.	Menjual kebutuhan sehari-hari
4.	Toko/tempat usaha permanen

Benefit yang didapatkan berupa harga khusus dari Indogrosir, selain itu juga mendapatkan potongan harga/hadiah lansung atau mypoin yang dapat digunakan sebagai pemotong pembayaran.

Member Platinum
Diberikan kepada member merah dengan transaksi rata-rata perbulan minimal senilai tertentu. Benefit yang didapatkan berupa harga dan pelayanan khusus.


Klik Indogrosir, Belanja Hemat Banyak Untungnya 
Berdiri dari tahun 1993 melayani kebutuhan konsumen lewat 29 cabang toko, Indogrosir hadir lebih dekat untukmu melalui Klik Indogrosir, guna mempermudah Anda berbelanja. Khususnya perdagangan secara perkulakan ( Member Merah/ Pedagang ) ataupun secara  eceran dan satuan ( Member Biru / End User )

Tinggal klik di Klik Indogrosir, kamu bisa mendapatkan ribuan pilihan produk yang lengkap dengan harga terbaik di Klik Indogrosir. 

Klik Indogrosir aman, nyaman, dan mudah berbelanja 


Varian Produk Beragam
Mau belanja beragam varian produk? Tentu bisa! 
Menyediakan ribuan produk yang dijual untuk memenuhi kebutuhan sehari hari seperti: kebutuhan sembako, makanan & minuman, kebutuhan ibu & bayi, produk kesehatan & kecantikan, perlengkapan kantor dan kebutuhan rumah tangga serta otomotif.
Harga yang lebih kompetitif dengan 3 strata harga yakni karton, minimal beli di toko (MBT), dan harga satuan. Anda dimungkinkan mendapatkan keuntungan karena mempunyai pilihan dalam berbelanja yaitu dengan harga yang lebih murah dengan belanja lebih banyak.

Dan dapatkan berbagai pilihan promosi menarik yang kami tawarkan untuk Anda!


Kemudahan & Keamanan Bertransaksi
Nikmati kemudahan dan keamanan bertransaksi online melalui Klik Indogrosir! Pilihan metode pembayaran yang bervariasi, seperti transfer antar bank (BCA Virtual Account, BRI Virtual Account, Mandiri Virtual Account, dan virtual account lainnya), cash on delivery/COD dan I-saku, serta payment point di toko Indogrosir seluruh Indonesia menjadi solusi transaksi yang terpercaya.

Luasnya Jangkauan Area Pengiriman

Tenang aja, di mana pun kamu berada, Klik Indogrosir akan terus hadir untuk mencukupi semua kebutuhanmu. 

Jangkauan area pengiriman Klik Indogrosir telah mencapai banyak titik kota di Indonesia, di antara nya Jabodetabek,Bandung,Sukabumi,Solo,Semarang,Yogyakarta,Surabaya,Malang,Medan,Pekanbaru,Jambi,Palembang,Bandar Lampung,Samarinda,Pontianak,Banjarmasin,Manado,Makassar,Kendari, mbon,Batam serta Purwokerto dan akan terus bertambah untuk membantu Anda menikmati pelayanan kami dalam berbelanja online.

Berbagai macam promo, potongan harga, diskon, hadiah, dan berbagai program loyalty 
Gratis biaya pengiriman*
Pembayaran di semua gerai toko Indogrosir 

Lebih dari sekadar tagline,  #BelanjaAmandanNyaman menjadi dasar bagi Klik Indogrosir untuk terus memberikan pelayanan dengan keamanan dan kenyamanan berbelanja serta bertransaksi dengan hanya 1 kali Klik

Belanja di Indogrosir makin aman, mudah, dan untung!
